name: Pizi
description:
Pizi

Pizi is a classic style platform game with a profile view where the player has to collect all the coins from every level in order to continue to the next level. 

It has 10 levels and an estimated duration of 15 to 25 minutes. 

The player has three lives at the start of each level  and these lives allow them to get damage up to two times and still be able to progress. If the player loses all their three lives, the game restarts from that very same level.

Players: 1

Play time: Between 15 and 25 minutes.

Objective: Open the exit door and pass through it by collecting every available coin from each level in order to progress to the next level.
